get_file_contents.description: Get the contents of a file or directory from a GitHub repository

content.text:
# MCP Python SDK

Official Python SDK for the Model Context Protocol.

## Installation

```bash
pip install mcp
```

## Quick Start

```python
from mcp import Server

server = Server("my-server")

@server.tool()
async def hello(name: str) -> str:
    return f"Hello, {name}!"
```

create_issue.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository

example_input.title: Add support for streaming responses
example_input.body:
## Description

It would be great to have built-in support for streaming responses.

## Use Case

Long-running tools that produce incremental output.
